title: Clay Classes
content:
Ever wanted to try throwing on the potters wheel? Or have you done pottery as a hobby in the past and want a chance to continue your craft?

Take a class at TRö.

Classes range from four week “Try the wheel” to open studio sessions.

[See class descriptions](listings/#clay-classes)

title: Workshops
content:
Want to make a gift for a friend? Have a fun evening out with friends?

Take a workshop at TRö.

Each workshop will feature a project that can be completed in one session. Seasonal workshops like christmas ornaments or summer plant tags will be mixed with projects like lace textured dishes, house numbers and plaques.

[See class descriptions](listings/#workshops)

title: Kids and Family Classes
content:
Want to have a fun afternoon with your family? Or get your toddler started in Art?

Take a workshop at TRö.

Each workshop will center around a single project. Examples include Halloween pumpkins, Mother’s Day gifts and Family Hand Prints.

[See class descriptions](listings/#kids-and-family-classes)

title: Private Events
content: Girls night out, corporate team building or a fun activity for out of town guests. We can host a fun, messy and creative afternoon (or evening) for you and your guests.
